info.name: Clinic Management System - Complete API Collection
info.description:
Complete comprehensive API collection for the Clinic Management System with Clean Architecture. This collection combines all individual API collections into a unified testing suite.

## API Coverage

### üîê Authentication API (/api/auth)
- User registration with role-based access (admin, doctor, receptionist)
- User login with email/username support
- JWT token management and validation
- Password strength validation
- Doctor-specific profile fields during registration

### üë• User Management (/api/users)
- User CRUD operations
- Password change functionality
- Role-based operations and filtering
- User profile management

### üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Doctor Management (/api/doctors)
- Doctor profile CRUD operations
- User-Doctor relationship management
- Medical specialization tracking
- License and experience management
- Philippine and US phone number validation

### üè• Patient Management (/api/patients)
- Patient CRUD operations
- Patient statistics and reporting
- Structured Philippine address management
- Guardian information handling
- Medical history tracking

### üìÖ Schedule Management (/api/schedules)
- Doctor schedule CRUD operations
- Date and time validation
- Schedule statistics and reporting
- Today's doctor lookup
- Future schedule filtering

### üìã Appointment Management (/api/appointments)
- Appointment CRUD operations
- Business rule validation (4 per slot, no duplicates)
- Status management (scheduled, confirmed, cancelled)
- Patient-Doctor association
- Time slot management

### üß™ Laboratory Management (/api/laboratory)
- Laboratory request management
- Blood chemistry results tracking
- Critical value alerting
- Test selection and validation
- Patient-lab request association

### üìç Address API (/api/address)
- Philippine address hierarchy (provinces, cities, barangays)
- Address validation and lookup
- Geographic data management

### ‚úÖ Todo Management (/api/todos)
- Complete todo CRUD operations
- Priority and completion management
- Todo filtering and statistics

## Testing Strategy

This collection follows comprehensive testing best practices:
- **Happy Path Testing**: Core functionality validation
- **Error Handling**: Validation errors, authentication failures, not found scenarios
- **Schema Validation**: Response structure verification
- **Dynamic Data**: Variable management for realistic test flows
- **Performance Testing**: Response time validations
- **Security Testing**: Authentication and authorization flows
- **Business Logic Testing**: Complex validation rules and constraints

## Environment Variables

Use the following environment variables:
- `cms_local`: http://localhost:4000 (for local development)
- `cms_prod`: https://capstone-api.up.railway.app (for production)
- `baseUrl`: Base URL for backward compatibility
- `authToken`: JWT token for authenticated requests
- Various test data variables for dynamic testing

## Collection Organization

The collection is organized into logical folders matching the API structure:
1. üè• Server Health & Info
2. üîê Authentication API
3. üë• User Management API
4. üë®‚Äç‚öïÔ∏è Doctor Management API
5. üè• Patient Management API (from copy collection)
6. üìÖ Schedule Management API
7. üìã Appointment Management API
8. üß™ Laboratory Management API
9. üìç Address API
10. ‚úÖ Todo Management API (from copy collection)
